setup_script_description: sets focus on a link after the 'Breadcrumb Example' link
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Breadcrumb Example' link.
output_assertions: Role of the landmark region, 'navigation', is conveyed
Name of the landmark region, 'Breadcrumb', is conveyed
'Role of the breadcrumbs container, 'list', is conveyed
Number of list items, 4, is conveyed
